snippet: The parents of a Border Patrol agent killed in a shootout linked to the gun-smuggling operation Fast and Furious say officials should have known it created a risk to law enforcement officers.
abstract: Parents of Brian A Terry, Border Patrol agent who was killed in shootout linked to gun-smuggling operation known as Fast and Furious, have sued federal officials, claiming that they should have known it created a risk to law enforcement officers.
lead_paragraph: The parents of a Border Patrol agent killed in a shootout linked to the gun-smuggling operation Fast and Furious say officials should have known it created a risk to law enforcement officers.

headline.main: Arizona: Lawsuit Filed by Family of Agent Killed in Shootout
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Lawsuit Filed By Family of Agent Killed In Shootout
